amendment.description: Amendment extends the service obligation for recipients of cybersecurity scholarships or fellowships on a sliding scale depending on the degree program involved.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 111-410 to extend the service obligation for recipients of cybersecurity scholarships or fellowships on a sliding scale depending on the degree program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shea-Porter amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
